statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT user_id, username, post_text, post_date, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT username, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, username, post_date FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, post_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND sentiment_score < 0;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_sentiment_score FROM social_media_sentiment_analysis;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_specialization FROM analysts;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_specialization FROM analysts WHERE analyst_specialization = 'Data Science';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_specialization FROM analysts WHERE analyst_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM analysts WHERE analyst_specialization = 'Data Science';
SELECT analyst_id, analyst_name FROM analysts WHERE analyst_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM analysts ORDER BY analyst_name DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_specialization FROM analysts WHERE analyst_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000','456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_score FROM social_media_data;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT tweet_id, content FROM tweets WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT tweet_id, date_posted FROM tweets WHERE date_posted > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE positive_sentiment = true AND negative_sentiment = false;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT content, date_posted FROM tweets WHERE user_id = 5 AND date_posted > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content, positive_sentiment, negative_sentiment FROM tweets JOIN sentiment_analysis ON tweets.tweet_id = sentiment_analysis.tweet_id WHERE sentiment_analysis.positive_sentiment = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM public.twitter_users;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM public.twitter_users WHERE user_location = 'New York';
SELECT tweet_text, tweet_date FROM public.tweets ORDER BY tweet_date DESC;
SELECT tweet_text, sentiment_score FROM public.sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5;
SELECT analysis_id, analyst_name, analysis_date FROM public.analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM public.twitter_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT tweet_text, tweet_date FROM public.tweets WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY tweet_date DESC;
SELECT tweet_text, sentiment_category FROM public.tweets t JOIN public.sentiment_analysis sa ON t.tweet_id = sa.tweet_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT analyst_name, analysis_date FROM public.analysis_results ar JOIN public.tweets t ON ar.tweet_id = t.tweet_id WHERE t.user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM public.twitter_users tu JOIN public.tweets t ON tu.user_id = t.user_id WHERE user_location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaUsers;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count FROM SocialMediaUsers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_created_at FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_role FROM PoliticalAnalysts WHERE analyst_role = 'Data Analyst';
SELECT s.analysis_result, a.analyst_name FROM SentimentAnalysisResults s JOIN PoliticalAnalysts a ON a.analyst_id = s.analysis_id;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaUsers WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM SocialMediaUsers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT username, post_created_at FROM SocialMediaUsers JOIN SocialMediaPosts ON SocialMediaUsers.user_id = SocialMediaPosts.user_id ORDER BY post_created_at DESC;

SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result, analyst_name FROM SentimentAnalysisResults JOIN PoliticalAnalysts ON SentimentAnalysisResults.analysis_id = PoliticalAnalysts.analyst_id WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM AnalystSentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_id ASC, analyst_id DESC;
